analysis.description:
lucky9io.fallback (/unique_chucks/16/0x53c2c4ee7e625d0e415288d6e4e3f38a1bcb2038.sol#40-103) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lucky_number % 3 == 0

lucky9io.owner should be constant (/unique_chucks/16/0x53c2c4ee7e625d0e415288d6e4e3f38a1bcb2038.sol#30-31)
lucky9io.value should be constant (/unique_chucks/16/0x53c2c4ee7e625d0e415288d6e4e3f38a1bcb2038.sol#34-35)
lucky9io.value (/unique_chucks/16/0x53c2c4ee7e625d0e415288d6e4e3f38a1bcb2038.sol#34-35) is never used in lucky9io
